name: open_digger
description: OpenDigger 是针对开源生态数据的开源分析平台
descriptionEn: OpenDigger is an open source analysis platform for all open source data.

name: hypercrx
description: 可以为 GitHub、Gitee 等平台的仓库、开发者提供数据洞察的浏览器插件
descriptionEn: A browser extension for insights into GitHub, Gitee projects and developers.
